topics.body:
A Jehova's Witness knocks a on a door. It is opened by a five year old boy wearing a giant sombrero, smoking a fat cigar and drinking a martini.

The JW, shocked, asks "are your parents home?!"

The little boy responds "the fuck do you think?"
